sense.def:
A contrast
je velika razlika med dvema ali več predmeti.

seg.quote: ...the contrast between his public image and his private life.

sense.def:
Če je ena stvar
a contrast to another
, je zelo različna od druge stvari.

seg.quote: The atmosphere of the Second War was a complete contrast to that of the First.

sense.def:
Če ena stvar
contrasts with another
, je zelo različna od druge stvari.

seg.quote: ...a willingness to promote change, which contrasts strongly with the previous government's conservatism.

sense.def:
By contrast
ali
in contrast
rečemo, kadar omenimo nekaj, kar nasprotuje pravkar povedanemu.

seg.quote: By contrast, our use of oil has increased enormously.
This second movement, in contrast, reached a membership of 100,000 in two years.

sense.def:
To contrast things
pomeni pokazati razliko med stvarmi.

seg.quote: The book contrasts the methods used in America and Russia.
